医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
居住在弱势地区可将ALS的生存时间减少30％以上一项由密歇根州医学领导的研究表明，生活在弱势群体中可能会降低一个人可以通过肌萎缩性侧面硬化症或ALS生存的时间长度超过30％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/living-in-disadvantaged-areas-reas-reduces-als-als-als-survival time-by-over-over-3025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/living-in-disadvantaged-areas-reases-reduces-als-als-survival-survival-survival-survival-by-over-3025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788885434-e0e8-44f3-9bf3-9bf5-e531d182e2e2f9 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 22:05:00 -0500 Living in disadvantaged areas reduces ALS survival time by over 30%
研究揭示了神经元如何在蛋白质合成过程中节省能量神经细胞具有令人惊奇的策略来节省能量，并且仍然执行最重要的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-how-neurons-save-energy-energy-dering-protein-synthesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-how-neurons-save-energy-energy-dering-protein-protein-synthesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1A71E24B-27A5-4F97-A691-3F9176D717F1 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:59:00 -0500 Study reveals how neurons save energy during protein synthesis
电子监测可以提高福祉并延迟癌症患者的症状恶化经常通过家庭电子监测系统报告症状的人的生活质量，临床成果和福祉的改善，而急诊就诊少于未提交报告的急诊就诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/electronic-monitoring-boosts-well-boosts-well-being-and-being-and-symptom-symptom-derioration-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/electronic-monitoring-boosts-well-boosts-well-being-and-being-and-symptom-symptom-derioration-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d30fcfc-64bb-4d21-8392-5f7e1c77e395 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:51:53 -0500 Electronic monitoring boosts well-being and delays symptom deterioration in cancer patients
DNA条形码和公民科学揭示了Lantana控制代理的全球传播使用公开共享的DNA条形码和公民科学图像的新CABI领导的研究提供了有关用于控制主要入侵性灌木Lantana Camara的生物控制剂的新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/dna-barcodes-and-citizen-science-reveal-reveal-global-spread-spread-of-lantana-control-agent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/dna-barcodes-and-and-citizen-science-reveal-reveal-global-science-reveal-science-pread-lantana-control-agent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=458B3829-A892-4C5F-A47A-147679BBB49D Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:43:25 -0500 DNA barcodes and citizen science reveal global spread of Lantana control agent
怀孕并发症的妇女姐妹面临较高的心血管疾病风险经历了怀孕并发症的妇女患心血管疾病的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/sisters-of-women-women-with-pregnancy-complenancy-face-face-face------------------------------- of-complease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/sisters-of-women-women-with-with-pregnancy-complemination-face-face-higher------------------------ comper- of-comperaf-of-Cardiescular-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=167007BC-5C51-4AB2-AD65-2AAFA10F3C45 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:38:50 -0500 Sisters of women with pregnancy complications face higher risk of cardiovascular disease
美国成年人误解了枪支在家的风险和益处美国约有40％的家庭报告说，枪支访问和大多数枪支所有者报告说，通常至少存储了其无抵押的一种枪支。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/us-adults-misults-risks-risks-and-risks-and-benefits-of-firearm-access-access-at-home.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/us-adults-misults-misundersand-risks-and-risks-and-benefits-of-firearm-access-access-at-home.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d63ae34C-0F3D-4D70-B70C-C822FD92B3EF Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:25:00 -0500
研究揭示了空气污染对衰老社会的健康和经济影响空气污染是全球越来越多的健康问题，在日本等衰老社会中，其影响通常被低估了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-health-and-enhealth-and-ecomonic-ecomonic-ecomonic-impact-er-air-pollution-ingage-societies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-reveals-health-and-enhealth-and-ecomonic-ecomonic-ecomonic-impact-oar-impact-er-air-pollution-inging-societies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc3ca2c0-241-41-4dce-8690-A6527ECF9F5F Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:23:00 -0500 Study reveals health and economic impact of air pollution in aging societies
修改生物材料可能会导致更有效的癌症疗法VTC的弗拉林技术研究人员说，修改微观生物材料的物理特征与人体组织无缝相互作用可以解锁更安全，更有效的癌症治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/modifying-biomaterials-may-lead-to-more-effective-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/modifying-biomaterials-may-lead-lead-to-more-effective-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=799444464-998B-4DA5-A7A3-F7AC84CC07A7 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:19:28 -0500 Modifying biomaterials may lead to more effective cancer therapies
研究表明，医院如何安全地减少不必要的术前测试对于许多患者而言，准备进行手术意味着在手术前的几周内进行血液，检查心脏节奏或进行其他测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-shows-how-how-hospitals-can-safely-reduce-reduce-------------------safely-reduce--------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/study-shows-how-how-how-hostals-can-safely-reduce-reduce------------------safely-reduce-------------safely-reduce-notectss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4076365-1C7D-4C09-8588-2D5ED864F775 Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:15:16 -0500 Study shows how hospitals can safely reduce unnecessary preoperative tests
使用流行GLP-1药物的患者的视力损失风险引起了人们的关注服用非常流行的GLP-1药物的一小部分患者遇到了视力问题，但是尚未建立与药物的直接因果关系。这是1月30日在线发表的JAMA Ophthalmology在线发表的一项回顾性研究的结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/vision-loss-risks-in-patients-using-popular-glp-1-medications-raise-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250207/vision-loss-risks-in-patients-using-popular-glp-1-medications-raise-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b03f6562-9895-4613-922f-ae7ddedede3d9c Fri, 07 Feb 2025 21:11:34 -0500 Vision loss risks in patients using popular GLP-1 medications raise concerns
